Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its significant worth to you, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing the details further if you're interested. Kind regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
